CustomField.description: Conflicts found in the selected metadata types are not auto-resolved by Copado when merging feature branches into the promotion branch. The conflicts can be manually resolved using Copado.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Conflicts found in the selected metadata types are not auto-resolved by Copado when merging feature branches into the promotion branch. The conflicts can be manually resolved using Copado.
CustomField.label: Exclude From Auto Resolve
